Name: Give
SubTitle: Make a Donation
Details: As the owner of all, the Lord expects us to recognize His ownership. Deuteronomy 8:18 mentions: “But remember the Lord your God, for it is he who gives you the ability to produce wealth....” In return, He is simply inviting us to remember Him as the Owner and Provider.
